review.title: “Learnfull”
review.pros: Pros – The company provided all the equipments to fullfil your job, nice office and friendly staff.
review.cons: Cons – The office is far from the centers,difficult means of transport to the area.Lack of programming knowledge that makes my stage based on my research and without a mentor.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I would like to thank the manager for the opportunity that he gave me to fullfill my stage in his company and in this way working in a dutch company and enviroment.
